name: Gerdau S.A.
description: Gerdau S.A. is a leading steel manufacturer based in Brazil, known for its diverse range of steel products and commitment to sustainable practices. Founded in 1901, the company has grown to become one of the largest steel producers in the Americas, with operations spanning across Brazil, North America, and South America. Gerdau specializes in producing long steel products, flat steel products, and special steel, serving various sectors such as construction, automotive, energy, and manufacturing. The company emphasizes innovation and technological advancement, continuously improving its production processes and product quality. Gerdau is also dedicated to sustainability, implementing initiatives to reduce its carbon footprint and enhance recycling practices in its operations. With a strategic focus on operational efficiency and customer satisfaction, Gerdau aims to maintain its leadership position in the steel industry while contributing to the development of a circular economy.
headquarters: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
